full_threads.body:
Hey Nidhi,

First off—sorry for the delayed reply, and I'm really glad to hear you're happy with the implementation! You're very welcome.

About tracking the number of clicks on the new pop-ups:
Do you happen to have any analytics tools like Google Analytics or Microsoft Clarity already set up on your site?

Both are great for tracking user interactions and can give you insight into how the pop-ups are performing.

Always happy to help if anything else comes up!

Hi Adriane,

Thank you so much for the quick work and update.

Is there a way for us to track the number of clicks specifically on the new pop-ups?
Kind Regards,

Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228



DuraCube



DuraCube

Hey Nidhi,

Just a quick update—the recent changes have now been implemented:
  • The screenshotted section you attached from the Colours page has been removed
  • The banner you provided is now live in its place
    A popup has been added to both the Home and Colours pages
    • It appears 3 seconds after the page loads
    • It will only show once per session to avoid repeat interruptions

Feel free to take a look when you get a moment. Let us know if anything needs adjusting—always happy to help!

@joy @adriane dev update:

Pop up - Done (Will trigger 3 sec on load on Home and Colours page and will only show up once per session)
Colour page. Remove section and and replace it with the pop up design - Done

(Time: 60min)

For clarification, the "screenshot" (or screenshotted) section is this one:

Thanks, @whil !

@whil Please work on the following for https://duracube.com.au/

Pop-up Design:
  • View mock-up design
  • Should appear on the Home and Colours pages
  • Should display once per session only
  • “Register now” button should link to: https://duracube.com.au/login/

Colours page
  • Remove the screenshot section
  • Replace it with this new banner: View Banner Design
Tagging @joy for reminders ⏰✨ Thanks a bunch! 🙌

Not at the moment Adriane , but thank you so much for all your help .
Kind Regards,

Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant





13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750



1300 387 228

Hey Nidhi,

Got it—thank you so much for sharing the additional requirements!

We’ve noted the update to remove the screenshot section on the Colours page and replace it with the banner you provided. Development is planned to start tomorrow.

If we need any clarifications along the way, I’ll be sure to reach out. In the meantime, feel free to let me know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted—always happy to help!

Hi Adriane,

Additionally, could we please remove the screenshot section on the Colours page and replace it with the following banner:

Hey Nidhi,

We’d be delighted to add those pop-ups for you! I’m forwarding this request to our devs so they can get started. Thank you for sharing the mock-ups and details.

If there’s anything else you’d like us to adjust or add, just let us know—we’re always happy to help!

action.text: Adriane Roa assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Hi Team,

Could you please assist with adding the following pop-ups to the site?

Mock-up designs: View here

We'd like the pop-up to appear on:

  • The Home page

  • The Colours page

Ideally, the pop-up should only display once per session (not repeatedly).

The register now should be linked to : https://duracube.com.au/login/

Thank you for your help! Please let me know if anything else is required from my end

Kind Regards,
Nidhi Toppo
Marketing Assistant
13 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750
1300 387 228
